public abstract class ChestMenu extends Object implements InteractiveMenu

      public void refreshButton(int slot)
      Refreshes the button at the specified slot in the inventory.
      Parameters:
      slot - The slot number of the button to refresh. Must be between 0 and (rows * 9).

    • setRows

      public void setRows(int rows)
      Sets the number of rows in the menu.
      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows to set. Must be between MIN_ROWS and MAX_ROWS.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the rows value is not between MIN_ROWS and MAX_ROWS.

    • updateTitle

      public void updateTitle(@NotNull @NotNull String input)
      Updates the title of the chest menu and refreshes the inventory for all viewers.
      Parameters:
      input - The new title to set. Must not be null.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the input parameter is null.
